ACCOUNT_NAMING_SUPPORTED.Description: Provider supports assigning a display name for the billing account

AVAILABILITY_ZONE_SUPPORTED.Description: Provider supports deploying resources or services within an availability zone

MULTIPLE_PRICING_CATEGORIES_SUPPORTED.Description: Provider supports more than one pricing category across all SKUs

MULTIPLE_SUB_ACCOUNT_TYPES_SUPPORTED.Description: Provider supports more than one possible SubAccountType value

MULTIPLE_BILLING_ACCOUNT_TYPES_SUPPORTED.Description: Provider supports more than one possible BillingAccountType value

USAGE_MEASUREMENT_SUPPORTED.Description: Provider supports the measurement of usage

SUB_ACCOUNT_SUPPORTED.Description: Provider supports a sub account construct

BILLING_BASED_ON_PROVISIONED_RESOURCES_S.Description: Provider supports billing based on provisioned resources

RESOURCE_TYPE_ASSIGNMENT_SUPPORTED.Description: Provider supports assigning types to resources

PRICING_BILLING_CURRENCY_DIFFERENCES_SUP.Description: Provider supports pricing and billing in different currencies

VIRTUAL_CURRENCY_SUPPORTED.Description: Provider supports prices in virtual currency

REGION_SUPPORTED.Description: Provider supports deploying resources or services within a region

TAGGING_SUPPORTED.Description: Provider supports setting user or provider-defined tags

OR.Description: OR check items, will return true on ANY check passing

AND.Description: AND check items, will return true on ALL checks passing

ColumnPresent.Description: Check if column is present in the dataset

CheckDistinctCount.Description: Check if two columns have a distinct count equal to a value

FormatKeyValue.Description: Check a column has a key value format

CheckValue.Description: Check if column has a particular value

CheckNotValue.Description: Check if column does not have a particular value

CheckNotSameValue.Description: Check if column does not have the same value as another column

CheckSameValue.Description: Check if column does have the same value as another column

CheckDecimalValue.Description: Check if column has a valid decimal value

CheckGreaterOrEqualThanValue.Description: Check if column has value equal or greater than a value

CheckModelRule.Description: Check another ModelRule and turn its value

CheckNationalCurrency.Description: Check column has a valid national currency code

TypeDecimal.Description: Check column has the data type of decimal

TypeString.Description: Check column has the data type of string

FormatDateTime.Description: Check column has the format of datetime

FormatNumeric.Description: Check a column has a numeric format

FormatString.Description: Check a column has a string format

FormatUnit.Description: Check a column has a unit format

FormatCurrency.Description: Check a column has a currency format

ColumnByColumnEqualsColumnValue.Description: Check the result of a column value times by another column value and confirm if it matches the value of third column

TypeDateTime.Description: Check column has the data type of datetime
